changelog:
Syberia OS for chiron updated!

Current build date: 01/07/2019
firmware *REQUIRED* : V10.0.2.0 (latest stable)
Minimum TWRP required : 3.2.3 (wight554's one) or latest OrangeFox

Changelog:
- Fixed new files not updated on PC when connected to MTP
- Black theme fixes
- Fixed issue with AppOps service
- Fixed traffic indicator not hiding on lost connection
- Updated white-list telephony modules
- Add support for the .opus file format
- SyberiaSettings: Custom Rounded Corner and Padding preferences
- Launcher3: Add Google search double tap option
- Settings: Add new 20SEVEN font
- SmartNav: update smartbar home drawable
Device Specific:
- Rebased kernel by Wight554
- Synced Trees with latest wight changes
- Reworked XiaomiParts (Thanks to ArianK16)
- DT2W toggle is now in Settings > Display and not in parts

Download:  check OTA or visit our Downloads Portal https://syberiaos.com/downloads

#syberia #chiron #donate
